name: Crafted_Call_of_the_Sandman_F
display_name: Crafted Call of the Sandman F
display_fullname: Boosts.Crafted Call of the Sandman F
display_help: UNIQUE -- No more than 1 enhancement of this type may be slotted by a character. Gives a chance to Heal yourself 15% of your max life. This effect will trigger roughly 2 times per minute.
power_display_names: Call of the Sandman: Chance to Heal Self
